name: Evil Fragments(DEMO)
description:
Evil Fragments 

It is an adventure game in which you take on the role of a hero to rescue all the fragments stolen by the minions of a corrupt god.

The History:

In the times of our ancestors there were 6 gods who maintained control of the continent, to which one of them due to his great greed and power, wanted to control all the fragments to lead the continent. For which a war began between gods, ogres and humans.

Five of the gods, seeing the corrupt power of one of them, decided to ally themselves and thus end the corrupt god and ogres, but when making that unification their power was fragmented and thus the 6 fragments were created.

The fragments are: Dark, Death, Life, Love, Wealth and Power.

Each of these fragments have a special power. It is said that the gods were so afraid to unify them that the power would get out of control and there would be no chance for the continent if someone could bring them together and misuse them.

Game content:

cumestization of characters, armor, shields, swords, different enemies, bosses and more...
